EmailTemplate.name: Community Portal Forgot Password Admin Reset Email 1.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Reset your MySutter Connection password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
A request has been made to reset your MySutter Connection password To set up your new MySutter Connection password.
1. Please click link below. NOTE: You cannot use your last 5 passwords. {!Community_Url}
2. Once a valid new password has been created, you will be redirected to MySutter Connection.
3. Log in with your username mentioned at the lower left corner of this email and enter your new password.
Thank you,
The MySutter Connection Team
